SmartHouse Beta 1.0 Copyright (c) 2018 MUEI
*** END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT ***
IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS LICENSE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS SOFTWARE.
1. LICENSE
By receiving, opening the file package, and/or using SmartHouse Beta 1.0(Software) containing this software, you agree that this End User User License Agreement(EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
Unless you have a different license agreement signed by MUEI your use of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty.
Subject to the terms of this Agreement, MUEI grants to you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license, without right to sub-license, to use SmartHouse Beta 1.0 in accordance with this Agreement and any other written agreement with MUEI. MUEI does not transfer the title of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 to you; the license granted to you is not a sale. This agreement is a binding legal agreement between MUEI and the purchasers or users of SmartHouse Beta 1.0.
If you do not agree to be bound by this agreement, remove SmartHouse Beta 1.0 from your computer now and, if applicable, promptly return to MUEI by mail any copies of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 and related documentation and packaging in your possession.
2. DISTRIBUTION
SmartHouse Beta 1.0 and the license herein granted shall not be copied, shared, distributed, re-sold, offered for re-sale, transferred or sub-licensed in whole or in part except that you may make one copy for archive purposes only. For information about redistribution of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 contact MUEI.
3. USER AGREEMENT
3.1 Use
Your license to use SmartHouse Beta 1.0 is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of SmartHouse Beta 1.0.
3.2 Use Restrictions
You shall use SmartHouse Beta 1.0 in compliance with all applicable laws and not for any unlawful purpose. Without limiting the foregoing, use, display or distribution of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 together with material that is pornographic, racist, vulgar, obscene, defamatory, libelous, abusive, promoting hatred, discriminating or displaying prejudice based on religion, ethnic heritage, race, sexual orientation or age is strictly prohibited.
Each licensed copy of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 means that you have loaded, installed, or run SmartHouse Beta 1.0 on a computer or similar device. If you install SmartHouse Beta 1.0 onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 must be licensed separately.
You may make one copy of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of MUEI. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of SmartHouse Beta 1.0. If any person other than yourself uses SmartHouse Beta 1.0 registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!
3.3 Copyright Restriction
This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile SmartHouse Beta 1.0. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from SmartHouse Beta 1.0 in whole or in part.
MUEIs name, logo and graphics file that represents SmartHouse Beta 1.0 shall not be used in any way to promote products developed with SmartHouse Beta 1.0 . MUEI retains sole and exclusive ownership of all right, title and interest in and to SmartHouse Beta 1.0 and all Intellectual Property rights relating thereto.
Copyright law and international copyright treaty provisions protect all parts of SmartHouse Beta 1.0, products and services. No program, code, part, image, audio sample, or text may be copied or used in any way by the user except as intended within the bounds of the single user program. All rights not expressly granted hereunder are reserved for MUEI.
3.4 Limitation of Responsibility
You will indemnify, hold harmless, and defend MUEI , its employees, agents and distributors against any and all claims, proceedings, demand and costs resulting from or in any way connected with your use of MUEIs Software.
In no event (including, without limitation, in the event of negligence) will MUEI , its employees, agents or distributors be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect, special or punitive damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profits, loss of use, business interruption, loss of information or data, or pecuniary loss), in connection with or arising out of or related to this Agreement, SmartHouse Beta 1.0 or the use or inability to use SmartHouse Beta 1.0 or the furnishing, performance or use of any other matters hereunder whether based upon contract, tort or any other theory including negligence.
MUEIs entire liability, without exception, is limited to the customers reimbursement of the purchase price of the Software (maximum being the lesser of the amount paid by you and the suggested retail price as listed by MUEI ) in exchange for the return of the product, all copies, registration papers and manuals, and all materials that constitute a transfer of license from the customer back to MUEI.
3.5 Warranties
Except as expressly stated in writing, MUEI makes no representation or warranties in respect of this Software and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose.
3.6 Governing Law
This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the Spain applicable therein. You hereby irrevocably attorn and submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Spain therefrom. If any provision shall be considered unlawful, void or otherwise unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from this License and not affect the validity and enforceability of any other provisions.
3.7 Termination
Any failure to comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement will result in automatic and immediate termination of this license. Upon termination of this license granted herein for any reason, you agree to immediately cease use of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 and destroy all copies of SmartHouse Beta 1.0 supplied under this Agreement. The financial obligations incurred by you shall survive the expiration or termination of this license.
4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY
THIS SOFTWARE AND THE ACCOMPANYING FILES ARE SOLD AS IS AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR MERCHANTABILITY OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. THIS DISCLAIMER CONCERNS ALL FILES GENERATED AND EDITED BY SmartHouse Beta 1.0 AS WELL.
5. CONSENT OF USE OF DATA
You agree that MUEI may collect and use information gathered in any manner as part of the product support services provided to you, if any, related to SmartHouse Beta 1.0.MUEI may also use this information to provide notices to you which may be of use or interest to you.
